title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Competencies: UDL-Based Development of Personalized Learning Environment Measurement Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three UDL components and two implementation outcomes of the Personalized Learning Environment Measurement Tool (PLSI).
Learners can apply content validity verification procedures when developing items based on UDL principles.
Learners can complete a project analyzing personalized learning needs of small learner groups in digital environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
